QuestData.Title: The Court of Bones
QuestData.Description: The mogu within the nearby Court of Bones pose a constant threat to our foothold on this island. Grand Magister Rommath has been entrusted with halting their efforts, but I am certain he could use a capable $c to see this task through.$B$BGo to him. Aid in whatever ways that you are able.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Grand Magister Rommath outside the Court of Bones.
